questionnaire_title: What's your ultimate dream as a gamer?
questionnaire_description: This helps us create a homepage tailored to your needs. You can always change it later in Settings.
questionnaire_1: To stay up-to-date with the latest gaming news
questionnaire_2: To climb to the top of the leaderboards as a gamer
questionnaire_3: To buy top-of-the-line gear that best fits my needs
questionnaire_4: To excel as a group leader to inspire others to join
questionnaire_5: To connect with friends and feel part of the community
